channel.title: Windows Phone on Mohyddin Tash

item.title: Pathfinder
item.description: Pathfinder is a fully automated visual aid artificial assistant for the visually impaired and navigation system running in parallel via a sensor-fitted belt, connected to a cloud based mobile application. This project started out while my friends and I were still at the university. It was one of our first experiences in the ecosystem of startups and entrepreneurship. How it works: The device consists of two main parts: The belt which contains the arduino and the LAIDAR sensor for detecting slopes and edges, etc.
